Response: Avoid kissing people they don't know
Avoid handshakes with people they don't know
Maintain a minimum distance to people who seem sick
Avoid handshakes with people they know
Wash their hands when they come home
Wash their hands after touching products coming from outside
Manage to keep a safe 1m distance to everybody they approach outside their home
Cough or sneeze into their elbow/tissue
Cough sneeze or spit into disposable tissues
Wash their hands after blowing their nose
Manage to not touch their nose, eyes and mouth when outside of their home
Wear protective masks when going outside
